name: Ocean Star Match
description:
Take a full breath and jump into the submerged universe of match-3 fun

Features:
- Two mode game play " Arcade & Clasic"
- More than 100 well-designed levels in different scenes including candy, retro, snow, farm and more
- Amazing stunning magical effects (such blast mania, lighting splash, boom explosion)
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
